All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
AbstractDAO represents a generic form of all Data Acces Objects and implements all the operations that are necessary to modify the data from the tables : clients, products, orders.
Bill
The Bill class si responsible for holding the createBill method which will create the bill after an order is made
Client
Is the class that contains all information about a specific client
ClientDAO
This class is for the Client database
ClientView
The GUI for the Client View
ConnectionFactory
ConnectionFactory is a class used to establish the connection between the database and the program
Controller
The controller manages teh GUI windows, receives the inputs from the GUI and connects the GUI with the operations that aer in a strong relation with the database.

Main

Is the class that contains all information about a specific order
OrdersDAO
This class is for the Order database

Is the class that contains all information about a specific product
ProductDAO
This class is for the Product database
